oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General George Clinton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Engraving of George Clinton (1739-1812), posed in Revolutionary War uniform, leaning against cannon with musket nearby.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Generals; Vice presidents; Governors; Cannons; Rifles; Uniforms
Clinton, George, 1739-1812
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Governor of New York, 1777-1795, 1801-1804; Brigadier General, Continental Army; U. S. Vice President under Thomas Jefferson and James Madison. The engraving is from a painting by Alonzo Chappel.
